To start to build a website we do not need any fancy programms and extra software. Any computer will be able to do the job, regardless its specifications.\n So we begin ...

Open Notepad (preinstalled on all Windows machines), icon on the left, or download Notepad ++, icon on the right. Believe it or not, that is basically the software that is used for creating most of the programms. Then add code below and save file as index.html. Or give any other name, but keep .html extention.

Explanation of tables. \n How and where to use them, how to structure tables and make them invisible on a page. \n

Tables are used to arrange different information on a page, such as text or picturs and make design nice and clean. 
 Tables can be visible or invisible for a user. All that is done by setting table border parameters.
 Every table is made of table rows (tr) and table data(td). 
 By default table borders are invisible, but by adding "border = 1", border will apper. Number can vary, depending how you want your table to look like.
